alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 9:21AM CST until December 30 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Central Hancock County in southern Mississippi... * Until 1000 AM CST. * At 921 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kiln, or near Diamondhead, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
